examples.example: 我微笑着对客人说：“请进，欢迎来到我家。”

translate.english: I smiled and said to the guest, "Please come in, welcome to my home."

examples.example: 我打开门，礼貌地对朋友说：“请进，快进来坐吧。”

translate.english: I opened the door and said politely to my friend, "Please come in and come in and sit down quickly."

examples.example: 我热情地打开门，微笑着说：“请进，这里就是温馨的家。”

translate.english: I opened the door passionately, smiling and saying: "Please come in, here is the warm home."
